data.name: WindowTitle
data.comment: Application main window title

data.name: NotificationFormat_CopiedWords
data.comment: Notification format: "Copied {0} characters". {0} is replaced by the character count using string.Format with CurrentCulture.

data.name: NotificationFormat_LineBreakRemoved
data.comment: Displayed when line breaks are replaced with spaces (RemoveLineBreaks mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_WhitespaceNormalized
data.comment: Shown when newlines/tabs are converted to spaces and consecutive whitespace is collapsed (NormalizeWhitespace mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_NormalizeUnicode
data.comment: Shown when Unicode normalization is applied (NormalizeUnicode mode). Normalization form (e.g. FormKC) may be configured.

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveDiacritics
data.comment: Shown when diacritical marks (accents) are removed to produce a simplified ASCII-like string (RemoveDiacritics mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemovePunctuation
data.comment: Shown when punctuation characters are removed from the text (RemovePunctuation mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveControlChars
data.comment: Shown when control characters (e.g. non-printable C0/C1) are removed (RemoveControlCharacters mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveUrls
data.comment: Shown when URLs are removed from the text using a simple URL regex (RemoveUrls mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveEmails
data.comment: Shown when email addresses are removed from the text using a simple regex (RemoveEmails mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveHtmlTags
data.comment: Shown when HTML tags are stripped by a basic tag regex (RemoveHtmlTags mode). Not suitable for full HTML parsing.

data.name: NotificationFormat_StripMarkdownLinks
data.comment: Shown when Markdown links like [text](url) are replaced by their link text (StripMarkdownLinks mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ConvertTabsToSpaces
data.comment: Shown when tabs are converted to spaces (ConvertTabsToSpaces mode). Tab width can be configured via options.

data.name: NotificationFormat_Trim
data.comment: Shown when leading/trailing whitespace is removed (Trim mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ToUpper
data.comment: Shown when text is converted to upper case using the configured culture (ToUpper mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ToLower
data.comment: Shown when text is converted to lower case using the configured culture (ToLower mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ToTitleCase
data.comment: Shown when text is converted to title case using the configured culture (ToTitleCase mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ToPascalCase
data.comment: Shown when text is converted to PascalCase (ToPascalCase mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_ToCamelCase
data.comment: Shown when text is converted to camelCase (ToCamelCase mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_Truncate
data.comment: Shown when text is truncated to a maximum length (Truncate mode). Options: MaxLength, TruncateSuffix.

data.name: NotificationFormat_JoinLinesWithSpace
data.comment: Shown when multiple lines are joined into a single line separated by spaces (JoinLinesWithSpace mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_RemoveDuplicateLines
data.comment: Shown when adjacent duplicate lines are removed (RemoveDuplicateLines mode).

data.name: NotificationFormat_CollapseWhitespace
data.comment: Shown when consecutive whitespace is collapsed to a single space (CollapseWhitespace mode).

data.name: NotificationDurationTitle
data.comment: Deray to show notificaiotn

data.name: ClipboardAccessDeniedMessage
data.comment: Clipboard access was denied

data.name: AppTitle
data.comment: App title

data.name: AppVersion
data.comment: App version

data.name: AppDescription
data.value: This app is Clipboard Utility tool. It help you counting characters and processing text.

data.name: OperationGuidanceText
data.value: ・Right-clicking the taskbar icon opens the menu. ・Clicking the taskbar icon performs a string operation

data.name: SettingInfomationText
data.value: Some setting items will be reflected to reopen setting.

data.name: LicenseDescription
data.value: This software uses the following third-party software and fonts. Below are their required licenses and copyright notices.

data.name: AddStartUpGuidanceManuallyText
data.value:
1. Place this folder wherever you like. 2. Create a shortcut for `Clipboard Utility.exe`. 3. Place the created shortcut into the Startup folder.
*How to open the Startup folder:* Press the Windows key and the R key simultaneously. Type `shell:startup` and press Enter.

data.name: AddStartUpGuidanceManuallyTitle
data.value: How to execute this software when computer starts.

data.name: NoClipboardDataText
data.comment: Text shown when clipboard is empty

data.name: CharacterCountText
data.comment: Label for character count in tooltip

data.name: WordCountText
data.comment: Label for word count in tooltip

data.name: LineCountText
data.comment: Label for line count in tooltip

data.name: ClipboardManagerTitle
data.comment: Title for Clipboard Manager window

data.name: ClipboardPreviewText
data.comment: Label for clipboard preview section

data.name: TextProcessingText
data.comment: Label for text processing section

data.name: SelectProcessingModeText
data.comment: Label for processing mode selection

data.name: ApplyText
data.comment: Button text to apply processing

data.name: ProcessingInfoText
data.value: Select a processing mode and click Apply to transform the text.
data.comment: Information text for processing section

data.name: ActionsText
data.comment: Label for actions section

data.name: CopyToClipboardText
data.comment: Button text to copy to clipboard

data.name: RefreshText
data.comment: Button text to refresh clipboard content

data.name: ClearText
data.comment: Button text to clear text

data.name: CloseText
data.comment: Button text to close window

data.name: Preset_RemoveLineBreaks_Description
data.value: Removes all line breaks and replaces them with spaces

data.name: Preset_NormalizeWhitespace_Description
data.value: Normalizes all whitespace including full-width and half-width spaces
